thread.section_title: The Lex NYC - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A very pleasant stay
thread.title_full: A very pleasant stay - Review of The Lex NYC, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SouthernBelle74
title: A very pleasant stay
text: A friend recommended this hotel and it did not disappoint. The location is perfect, with several restaurants within walking distance, and it's close to public transportation. Our room was very large by NYC standards. The wifi is free (and good), which is rare in most hotels. The coffee and tea service is a nice touch. We would definitely stay again.
